____timestamp.description: ISO8601 combined date and time in UTC e.g. '2014-12-01T00:00:00+00:00'

___used_hours.description: The number of hours used - decimal(i.e.8.00 - not HH:MM)

___available_hours.description: The number of hours available - decimal(i.e.8.00 - not HH:MM)

____id.description: unique url-friendly base64 encoded, utf8 endoded concatenation identifier

___consulate.description: The name or identity of the consulate providing the appointment

___period.description: The period covered by each data point from the _timestamp

___service.description: The name of the service provided e.g. appointment
